Base:Descriptions.Base:Description: the outside of high blocky wall

The desolate dustiness of the wagon trail spreads even here, where a large wall made from squared boulders surrounds and blocks the area before you. You see no way in, and no way out of whatever it is the wall has been built around. A huge, rocky crater rises off to the west, a stream of odd colored smoke continuously rising from it's glowing depths. Broken down buildings litter the area around you, seemingly left to rot by their former inhabitants.
The outside of a very high, blocky wall.
The outside of a very high, blocky wall.

A huge, rocky crater rises off to the west, a stream of odd colored smoke continuously rising from it's green, glowing center. Sprinklings of pebbles glow with a faint pulse around the base of the crater.
A huge, rocky crater rises off to the west, a stream of odd colored smoke continuously rising from it's glowing depths.
The sky in this area is a hazy green color which seems to be caused from the odd smoke rising out of the distant rocky formation.
The sky in this area is a hazy green color which seems to be caused from the odd smoke rising out of the distant rocky formation.
A high blocky wall constructed from squared boulders surrounds and blocks the area before you. You see no way in, and no way out of whatever it is the wall has been built around.
A high blocky wall constructed from squared boulders surrounds and blocks the area before you. You see no way in, and no way out of whatever it is the wall has been built around.

Core:Properties.Core:Property: X[S] \{Lingering patches of fog lazily float over the visible skyline, fleetingly dimming areas of the path in shadow.\|An eagle screeches its majestic cry as it swoops overhead in search of food.\|A frigid breeze rushes through the path, creating an eery howl as the wind rushes past you.\|Something small skitters in the patches of greenery causing tiny pebbles to scatter down the cliff.\|A sudden gust of wind kicks up dust particles that seem to aim specifically for your eyes.\|A sudden, harsh gust of wind sends sharp icy flurries raining down on you at a swift speed.\|To and fro, the wind seems to be indecisive along in this channel as the falling flakes of snow seem to dance on the breeze.\}
